A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If it were possible to give this film no stars I would.  Legitimately one of the worst films i've ever watched.  The fact that 91% of critics gave this a positive review is the clearest sign that critics are available for purchase.  I'm sure disney will be happy they can sell their shitty little furby rip offs though.  Terrible acting\, horrendous plot\, little to no character development.  Crystal scull was a better addition to the indiana jones series than this was to star wars.  can't believe the extended universe was scrapped for this garbage.
